e_scooter_lr.short_description: Predicts percentage battery drop per ride based on distance, avg speed, temperature and rider weight.

parameters.name: RideDistance_km
parameters.label: Ride distance (km)
parameters.description: Distance travelled during the ride in kilometres.

parameters.name: AvgSpeed_kmh
parameters.label: Average speed (km/h)
parameters.description: Average ride speed in km per hour.

parameters.name: Temperature_C
parameters.label: Ambient temperature (°C)
parameters.description: Outside temperature during the ride in Celsius.

parameters.name: RiderWeight_kg
parameters.label: Rider weight (kg)
parameters.description: Weight of the rider in kilograms.

student_svm_linear.short_description: Binary classifier (Pass/Fail) using an SVM with linear kernel. Predicts whether a student will pass based on study hours and attendance.

parameters.name: Study_Hours
parameters.label: Study hours
parameters.description: Number of study hours per week.

student_svm_rbf.short_description: Binary classifier (Pass/Fail) using an SVM with RBF kernel. Predicts whether a student will pass based on study hours and attendance.

accuracy.notes: Accuracy on validation split (RBF kernel tends to capture nonlinear patterns)

parameters.name: Study_Hours
parameters.label: Study hours
parameters.description: Number of study hours per week.

student_svm_poly.short_description: Binary classifier (Pass/Fail) using an SVM with polynomial kernel. Predicts whether a student will pass based on study hours and attendance.

parameters.name: Study_Hours
parameters.label: Study hours
parameters.description: Number of study hours per week.
